summary: An Ordinance appropriating the sum of One Thousand Two Hundred Eleven and 64/100 (1,211.64) Dollars, or so much thereof as may be necessary, from the General Fund of the City of Seattle, to pay the city's portion of the cost of the improvement of Twenty-third Avenue North, by paving the same, as provided for in Ordinance No. 20389, creating Local Improvement District No. 1984.
